name: The 4th Asia Symposium on Engineering and Information
content: Organized by Higher Education Forum (HEF), the Asia Symposium on Engineering and Information (ASEAI) is scheduled to be held from Tuesday, April 19 to Thursday, April 21, 2016 in Jeju-do Island. ASEAI is the premier forum for the presentation and exchange of past experiences and new advances and research results in the field of engineering and information. Jeju- Nature’s paradise in the north pacific Jeju Island has a mild oceanic climate throughout the year with the smallest annual temperature range in Republic of Korea. The temperature for the hottest summer months averages no more than 35.8 ℃ and no less than -2.3℃ in Jeju City for winter. Jeju-do Island is known as Korea’s remarkable semi-tropical, volcanic island. With its incredible scenery and warm-hearted people, Jeju-do is a once in a lifetime destination! We sincerely invite you to participate to ASEAI 2016; you can not only meet the experts who have similar research interests with you, but also explore the preserved natural scenery in Jeju-do Island. Look forward to seeing you in ASEAI 2016!
